text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse You care about CORONAVIRUS? Trump jr has made it quite clear what both himself & his father feel about it! He calls it a Haox! When will you speak up? You must see the truth. If you don’t you are as corrupt as Trump & will go down with him. https://t.co/V4XvgyM7pz
